reactor.fn

Class Functions

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.fn.Functions
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Fn

    public abstract class Functions
extends Object
    Helper methods to provide syntax sugar for working with functional components in Reactor.
    Author:
    Jon Brisbin, Stephane Maldini, Andy Wilkinson

      • chain

        @SafeVarargs
public static <T> Consumer<T> chain(Consumer<T>... consumers)
        Chain a set of Consumers together into a single Consumer.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the event handled by the Consumer
        Parameters:
        consumers - the Consumers to chain together
        Returns:
        a new Consumer

      • pairFrom

        public static <LEFT,RIGHT,V> BiFunction<LEFT,RIGHT,V> pairFrom(Function<Tuple2<LEFT,RIGHT>,V> function)
        Wrap a given Function that applies transformation to a Tuple2 into a PairFunction.
        Parameters:
        function - tuple2 function to wrap into a PairFunction
        Returns:
        A BiFunction that delegates to a new applied tuple if called with 2 arguments an to the applied tuple itself.

      • functionFrom

        public static <LEFT,RIGHT,V> Function<Tuple2<LEFT,RIGHT>,V> functionFrom(BiFunction<LEFT,RIGHT,V> pairFunction)
        Wrap a given BiFunction that applies transformation to a Tuple2 into a Function Tuple2.
        Parameters:
        pairFunction - PairFunction to wrap into a Function
        Returns:
        A BiFunction that delegates to a new applied tuple if called with 2 arguments an to the applied tuple itself.

      • supplier

        public static <T> Supplier<T> supplier(Class<T> type)
        Creates a Supplier that will return a new instance of type each time it's called.
        Parameters:
        type - The type to create
        Returns:
        The supplier that will create instances
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if type does not have a zero-args constructor

        Returns:
